name: Eclair
description:
Eclair is a third person cover shooter that I created to showcase my level design skills in Unreal Engine 4.

Players must infiltrate the enemy base to shut down the AA laser cannon that shot them out of the sky.

This game only has one level and is just meant to be a short experience.

Visit my website for more information about the game at https://connorreich27.wixsite.com/connorleveldesign
